short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to customise download directory based off metadata

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to customise how your downloads are organised on your computer, splitting downloads into separate folders based off date or time, using a format you pick.
